document.full_text: apple has proposed a standardized sim card smaller than those it currently uses in the iphone and ipad to be able to produce thinner devices, an orange executive told reuters on tuesday.
document.title: apple plans smaller sim card
lines_and_colors: apple has proposed a standardized sim card smaller than those it currently uses in the iphone and ipad to be able to produce thinner devices, an orange executive told reuters on tuesday.
